title: Qesa story
creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling and Yvonne Kyriakos
brief_description: Qesa means story in Arabic and Yvonne Kyriakos from the Craig Family Centre believes that it is the stories that come with the newly arrived communities that helps them to connect not only with their own communities but also with their new communities. The Centre offers support and assistance with empathy, respect and appreciation of these stories which share past experiences, cultures and traditions.
